channel.title: The wilderness sign you get
channel.description: I have pimpscape as a source. I recently however made varrok and ::range safezone. How can i remove the wilderness sign from those places??? Id also like dummy to be safezone, i'll use a tut to make that safe but how can i remove the skull from there too?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2007, 12:21:12 AM[/size][hr]Does anybody know??

item.title: The wilderness sign you get
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

Will it still show up when I really am in the wilderness? I dont want it gone forever just gone when your in varrok or ::range which are safezones.

EDIT I looked in client.java and the closest i got to your directions were…

public boolean WildernessWarning = false;

the thing i’m confused about is that it was already false when i looked

Read full topic

item.title: The wilderness sign you get
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

search

wildernesswarn = true

and change true to false

Read full topic
